cause.description:
Instead of having so much controversy, we should praise Jesus and God whenever we want and however we want, because that's what matters. We all have the same cause, so why can't we just get together like Jesus would want us to? So make some friends, get together, and share the good news of the Lord our God.
1. Jesus is God.
2. The Bible is our basis.
cause.name: More Jesus, Less Religion
